title: Additional FS Shehryar calls on Vice President Ghana
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 06 (APP): Additional Foreign Secretary (Africa) Ambassador Shehryar Khan on Wednesday made separate calls on Vice-President of the Republic of Ghana Dr. M Bawumia and Foreign Minister and Regional Integration Shirley Ayorkor Botchwey in Accra.
Ambassador Shehryar is currently on a visit to Ghana to attend the Ministerial Conference on Peacekeeping, Foreign Office Spokesperson posted on X.
https://x.com/ForeignOfficePk/status/1732394160718860506?s=20
